Package gui

Class ReservationsFrameController

java.lang.Object
gui.ReservationsFrameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IController
public class ReservationsFrameController extends Object implements IController
Controller class for the Reservations Frame UI. Manages the display and interaction with the reserved books table.

    reservedData
    ObservableList for managing and updating the TableView with reserved books.
